text:
PRACTICE: Click on the six dots on the top right of this tile, and drag the whole tile into your workspace at right. Once you have a copy of this tile:

  • Make this line bold
  • Put this line in italics
  • Replace this line with name of your favorite color

This practice tile is designed to get students familiar with the functionalities of the text tile. Note that the third bullet asks students to write the word of their favorite color, not actually change the font color.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Below are labeled versions of the toolbars that you will encounter in your workspace. Farther below there is the Sample Travel Time model.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
